name: AVPlayerViewPictureInPictureDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines the methods to implement to respond to Picture in Picture playback events.

items.name: func playerViewWillStartPicture(inPicture: AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture playback is about to start.

items.name: func playerViewDidStartPicture(inPicture: AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture playback started.

items.name: func playerViewWillStopPicture(inPicture: AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture playback is about to stop.

items.name: func playerViewDidStopPicture(inPicture: AVPlayerView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture playback stopped.

items.name: func playerView(AVPlayerView, failedToStartPictureInPictureWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that Picture in Picture playback failed to start.

items.name: func playerView(AVPlayerView, restoreUserInterfaceForPictureInPictureStopWithCompletionHandler: (Bool) -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to restore the user interface before Picture in Picture playback stops.

items.name: func playerViewShouldAutomaticallyDismissAtPicture(inPictureStart: AVPlayerView) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate if the player view should miniaturize when Picture in Picture starts.
